1370: Trueb moved to Goetscalcstraet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Hadewigis at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Hadewigis, Trueb, at age 19.
1371: Had a son with Hadewigis, Rembrandus, at age 20.
1372: Had a daughter with Hadewigis, Alene, at age 21.
1373: Had a daughter with Hadewigis, Euffemia, at age 22.
Lost son Rembrandus when Rembrandus was 3 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Hadewigis, Iris, at age 23.
1377: Had a daughter with Hadewigis, Sophia, at age 26.
1378: Lost daughter Iris when Iris was 5 years old.
1380: Had a son with Hadewigis, Ghisebrecht, at age 29.
1381: Had a daughter with Hadewigis, Woltwigis, at age 30.
1383: Had a son with Hadewigis, Hildebolding, at age 32.
1384: Had a son with Hadewigis, Wasseliin, at age 33.
1390: Lost son Ghisebrecht when Ghisebrecht was 11 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1393: Lost daughter Alene when Alene was 22 years old.
